column3:
â€œCherry Bomb is definitely one of the most powerful highs I've ever had. I can only compare the high to the idea of your head bouncing off the walls like a ping pong ball. Some strains make you relaxed, euphoric, and sedated. Whereas this strain sort of throws your brain to Pluto. These are all good things. I would save Cherry Bomb for a special occasion when you want to get wasted.

It's a fairly new strain here in L...â€

â€œCreative, focused, energetic high. I found myself banging out music and slinging witticisms at everyone - made me feel like I wanted to have fun, if that makes sense. Highly recommended for creative types that do not want a body high (I felt none whatsoever) or anyone that wants a focused, energetic boost for daytime use.â€

â€œWithout doubt one of the best strains i've smoked to date. I'm a long-time sufferer from depression and stress and this strain has helped me control those issues. The smoke is also a highlight, I tend to vape and the sweet cherry/berry flavour that comes through is exceptional!â€

â€œGreat daytime weed. The high comes on quick and only last 45-60 minutes in lower amounts. Time really slows down. Makes the 45 minutes feel like 145. The high lasts longer with more consumption. Definitely versatile in how and why and where you could use it. Pretty functional high. Probably could use this at work pretty successfully under small doses.â€
â€œOne best tasting strains bomb seeds cherry bomb really has cherry flavor great up lifting high it a new favoriteâ€

â€œWhere to begin?  The smile that comes out of nowhere and makes your face hurt.  The energy to get things done and the clarity to not screw then up.  This strain was perfect for my depression and anxiety and is my favorite after trying at least a hundred strains.  I love you Cherry Bomb!â€

â€œOne of my Favorite strains, Awesome taste very sweet flavor and aroma, full body high accompanied with a great head high. Not sedating but very relaxing. I would highly recommend trying this strain as a top shelf bud for the experience; or buying as much as you can if you can find a good deal on it.â€

â€œAlright I really really liked the flavor of this oil but the high seemed confused, almost to much of a hybrid and not really knowing itself well enough, kinda like me in my twenties...anyway I ended up eating the high away anyway as this is definitely an appetite stimulating strain, surround the sesh with some fruits and other good snacks, your welcome!â€
â€œGives you a crazy head high at the same time as a mellow body high. Would definitely smoke again.â€

â€œGood stuff, but turns me into a blabbering fool. Maybe I was like that to begin with, but hey...

Just use at your own risk.â€
â€œThis is a really great strain. I use it in the mornings, it's great to get going with. It was pretty strong but that is how i like it. Taste great and a very clear high.â€

â€œAlright I really really liked the flavor of this oil but the high seemed confused, almost to much of a hybrid and not really knowing itself well enough, kinda like me in my twenties...anyway I ended up eating the high away anyway as this is definitely an appetite stimulating strain, surround the sesh with some fruits and other good snacks, your welcome!â€
â€œThis is to date the best quality yielding strain I have found that continues to impress meâ€

â€œI smoked this strain about 5 years ago, and I'm just reviewing it now [If, that tells you something.] -
***** What I got. was California outdoor grown, organic 'CHERRY BOMB'.
Rare these days, but I digress...

It was, addictive, I don't know how else to say it. My buddy ripped me off, for this strain!!! No kidding LOL.

The buds were red and solid and sativa all the way.
The taste was explosive, with berry overtones....â€

â€œGood stuff, but turns me into a blabbering fool. Maybe I was like that to begin with, but hey...

Just use at your own risk.â€

â€œğŸ’ğŸ’£ as the name implies it is some cherry bomb! Very nice flavor not overly fruity or overly gassy. Excellent Bliss point. The buds could have used a full Peak and a better grower but overall it's a solid strain with good genetics if cared for properly. Still it's like wrapping yourself in a warm blanket.... oh cherry, you da bomb!ğŸ’ğŸ’£â€

â€œThis strain is a weaker hybrid- the bit I bought came in at just under 10% THC. It was a mild, background high that lasted about 30 minutes per bowl. Experienced users should look to other strains to satisfy their need for a creative buzz.â€

â€œThis is a great strain. 

The taste is distant but theres still a hint of the berry and somewhat tropical, while being very pungent at the same time. Initially hit very hard, and sustained for 1 hour after, with light spells of dizziness and paranoia. I was very happy and uplifted, with energy, but sitting on the couch still feels better. Music sounded amazing, and i was very talkative and nice. After about an hour i...â€

â€œThis is the perfect strain to smoke midday. I smoked one big bowl of this cherry bomb and got so high. I felt energized, focused and creative. That I wrote more for my sociology intro paper. I answered the question how can sociology be used to deal with issues like ethnocentrism and cultural relativity? And I wrote a huge paragraph and I thought I did an excellent job. I also enjoyed a great meal that I prepared for ...â€
â€œI really enjoyed Cherry Bomb!â€
â€œOne of my personal favorite strains! Perfect for getting you through the day :)â€
â€œGreat strain for any activity and I mean any activity!  Great for smoking and going to work if your a regular smoker.â€
â€œOverall it was a nice feeling but I felt lazier than I expected. I wasnâ€™t glued to the couch or anything but I wouldnâ€™t even want to play board games. Great taste but smokeier than I prefer.â€

â€œExtremely potent but not enough to keep you down. Mellow scent, but don't judge a nug by smell. This stuff smokes really well and will creep up on you. Rolled up a blunt and i was in a deep focus and extremely creative. Enjoy fam ğŸ™â€

Blueberry provides a very relaxing, yet not too potent high. You won't have a problem participating in any activities, although you may wish you were back on your couch watching Comedy Central with a bag of Cape Cod chips, and a nice fat ...â€

â€œOk so picked up some cake badder by west coast cure called cherry Bhomb! After reading about this I can say all leafly has to say is on point. It had me tripping the first day like mad energy. I usually never get anxious or anything but this strain is something else five fucking stars bravo cherry bomb you are fire!!!!!!!!!â€

â€œTried this strain last week and it was amazing. Very flavorful, I felt like I was eating cherry pie. As for the high, I was still able to get things done. It wasn't an overpowering high. I would definitely try more .â€
â€œone of my fav to smoke during the day and just have a good time with out feeling lazy or sleepy.â€

â€œI am very happy with this strain. it really relaxes me when I'm having an anxiety attack, in fact, I almost completely forget about all my problems haha. And I love hybrids like this because it puts me on the right level of focus and happiness.â€

â€œWith a scent true to it's name, it emanates a musky yet fruity aroma. Smooth smoke and dense nuggets are characteristic. It was very enjoyable, however while coming down I experienced a mild headache but three Ibuprofen later I was fine.â€
â€œSlow start but smooth rapid rise in body and head high" more like relaxation. I could feel the tension and stress ease away.â€"
â€œthis is my all time favorite strain to smoke..â€
â€œGreat effects. Flavor is not one of my favorites. Kind of a down to business" type smoke. Not a lot of enjoyment in the flavor.â€"
â€œthe best one they have is cherry bomb amazing tastes amazing smell not harsh but super strong for pain and still not a drag u down weed 5* for meâ€

â€œpleasant buzz, the smell wasnt super strong but the buzz lasted longer than usual.â€

â€œCherry Bomb is the perfect strain of you want to kick back and relax at the end of a long day, but want to stay awake and enjoy your high! Full body relaxation and euphoria, combined with a solid, happy head high. Quite a tasty strain too!â€

â€œCherry Bomb is the bomb but not quite a 5 for picky olâ€™ me!!
Big packed buds, fluffed up nice out of the grinder, clean even burn. The only bomb is that it seems to make me cough, triggers a bit of the asthma. Fruity flavour of berry/cherry for sure & I did find myself daydreaming off the bong lol so hits you clean and mean lol. 4.5 for me, a chill relaxed but not fatigued high and some back pain relief. Cherry bomb ...â€

â€œThis was disappointing. Almost no flavor. The thc level is ok, the bag says 17%. but there is not much of a high, probably no terpenes in this strain. Lots of leaf and stem attached to the buds. Maybe its the grower, Hi Guys. Not impressed.â€
â€œone of my fav to smoke during the day and just have a good time with out feeling lazy or sleepy.â€

â€œThis strain has been amazing for me! It has mellowed me out from high sensory anxiety and allows me to think with a clear head. I have nothing but positive vibes from this strain.â€

â€œThe buds are huge and dense. They are somewhat tough to grind up, but yield a ton in a small bud. The smell is very strong, earthy and piney and delicious. The ground flowers burn and smoke very nicely and have a strong but again, very comforting earthy and piney taste and smell to the smoke. I generally tend to take smaller hits in order to avoid coughing but didn't notice this strain to be any harsher than any othe...â€
â€œSmoked it out of a joint... Pretty damn good. 5 mins into my high i got the really awesome tingling sensation in the back of my eyesâ€
â€œNot too bad for a Sativa. The taste is very earthy and kind of down to business". No frills here like fruity flavor or skunky. If anything slightly nutty perhaps?â€"
â€œA little overwhelming at first. The paranoia was intense for my girlfriend at first but it came to an end fairly quick. The head high is perfect.â€

â€œHello world i'm your wild girl! I'm your chchcch cherry bomb! This strain is impeccable kicked my ass and made me thank it for the favour. And i loved every minute of it. Tasty and stttroong!â€

â€œCherry Bomb is one of the strongest strains I've ever tried. It will have your brain bouncing off the walls like a ping pong ball. Good taste too. I tested it with a hot box vaporizer. Doesn't take much at all to get you stoned.â€
â€œlove!!!â€
â€œTHIS HELPS ALOT WITH CHRONIC PAINâ€

â€œWas fortunate enough to get my hands no this and try it!! Have to say, it smoked wonderfully(we put it in a cone).  The high came on rather quickly, but an extremely enjoyable experience as it made us all smile, maybe even a little giggly!!!!â€

â€œI'm going to give this a full 5. I just got mine in the mail today, along with a few other strains, but decided to start my night off with a bowl of this. 
The site I ordered it from had it on extremely cheap, and marked as a 'AA' order. I call bullsh*t, because I'm in another dimension as I write this review.
Definitely on the sative side of the hybrid, as I can definitely feel the heady high. Though, not like a str...â€

â€œWhen I first started smoking I didn't care what I smoked as long as I got high. Now I'm always asking my guy if he's got this strain. Love it. Hits me hard with the indica within the first hit (preferably joints) and then after awhile I felt the sativa which made me want to smoke more. Which was crazy for me because usually it's the other way around. Currently trying to grow 3 of these beauties. Can't have enough.â€
â€œVery fun and controlling high.  Thoroughly enjoyed the night accompanied by the OG squad.  Recommended for a chill night.â€
â€œLove, love, LOVE the clear-headed, relaxed-but-focused feel this strain provides! Anxiety relief but without sleepiness. I could see this becoming my preferred daytime strain.â€

â€œI smoked a joint of cherry bomb before helping one of my friend to move out of his appartement and it helped me alot. I was energised and realy focused on the job. It's a realy strong sativa strain and will help you to do things you don't like to do; clean the bathroom, ect.â€
â€œgreatest bud ever:)â€

PERFECT up.â€
